str2: Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
Pity, mercy, compassion. Of uncertain affinity; compassion.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To walk in, walk by. From a derivative of steicho; to march in rank, i.e. to conform to virtue and piety.
From kane; a rule, i.e. a standard; by implication, a boundary, i.e. a sphere.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; Israel, the adopted name of Jacob, including his descendants.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
